forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. Storms more numerous in the morning. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. Storms more numerous in the morning. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 18C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 64F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
